name: Default EDIT
description: Full edit vocabulary profile for image modification operations - 23+ trillion combinations
templates: Using the provided image, {edit_operation}. The modification should {blending_phrase}, with {lighting_consistency}. {preservation_clause}.

edit_operation: add a small knitted wizard hat on the subject's head, positioned naturally between the ears and angled slightly
add a pair of stylish sunglasses to the person, resting naturally on the bridge of their nose
add a colorful silk scarf draped elegantly around the neck
add a delicate flower crown resting atop the head
add a vintage leather messenger bag slung over the shoulder
add a gold pendant necklace centered on the chest
add elegant drop earrings to the ears
add a classic wristwatch on the left wrist
add a detailed tattoo sleeve on the visible arm
add subtle natural makeup enhancing the facial features
remove the person visible in the background, naturally reconstructing the obscured area
remove the distracting object on the left side of the frame
remove all text and watermarks from the image
remove the unwanted shadow falling across the subject
remove the background clutter behind the main subject
remove the blemishes and imperfections from the surface
remove the vehicle partially visible at the edge
remove the modern elements that break the period aesthetic
change the background from the current setting to a serene mountain landscape
change the background to a moody urban nightscape with neon lights
change the background to a pristine white studio backdrop
change the background to a lush garden with blooming flowers
change the background to an elegant interior with warm lighting
change the sky from clear to dramatic stormy clouds
change the sky to a vibrant sunset with warm orange and pink tones
change the time of day from daytime to nighttime with moonlight illumination
change the time of day from night to golden hour with warm directional sunlight
change the season from summer to autumn with falling leaves and warm colors
change the season from spring to winter with snow covering surfaces
change the weather to rainy with wet reflective surfaces and overcast lighting
change the subject's hair color to a rich auburn red
change the subject's hair color to platinum blonde
change the subject's hair color to deep midnight black
change the subject's hair style to elegant waves cascading down
change the subject's eye color to striking emerald green
change the subject's eye color to deep sapphire blue
change the dress to deep crimson red while maintaining the same cut and fabric texture
change the shirt to a navy blue while keeping the same style
change the outfit to an elegant black evening gown
change the jacket to rich brown leather with visible stitching
change the sofa to a vintage brown leather chesterfield with tufted buttons
change the furniture to mid-century modern style in warm wood tones
change the wall color to a soft sage green
change the flooring to polished hardwood
replace the plain background with an ornate library filled with leather-bound books
replace the indoor setting with an outdoor beach scene at sunset
replace the modern furniture with antique Victorian pieces
replace the daylight with dramatic candlelit atmosphere
transform the photograph into the artistic style of Vincent van Gogh with swirling impasto brushstrokes
transform the image into a classic oil painting style with visible brushwork
transform the photograph into a watercolor painting with soft color bleeds
transform the image into an anime illustration style with clean lines
transform the photograph into a noir black and white with high contrast
transform the image into a vintage film photograph with grain and muted colors
transform the style to cinematic with anamorphic lens characteristics
transform the image into a Renaissance painting style with classical composition
place the logo from the reference image centered on the chest of the shirt
place the pattern from the reference onto the fabric surface
place the subject from the second image into this environment
composite the product onto the clean white background
turn this rough sketch into a polished photorealistic rendering
turn this line drawing into a fully colored illustration
turn this wireframe into a detailed 3D product visualization
integration_detail: Position it naturally with realistic proportions that match the scene
Ensure it appears genuinely integrated rather than overlaid
Match the existing perspective and scale of surrounding elements
Apply appropriate depth of field matching the focal plane
Harmonize the colors with the existing palette of the image
Integrate seamlessly with the surrounding textures and surfaces
Blend naturally with the environmental context
Render with consistent grain and noise matching the source
Match the compression artifacts and image quality
Follow the natural contours of the underlying surface
Respect the occlusion and layering of existing elements
Align with the visual weight and balance of the composition
blending_phrase: blends seamlessly with the surrounding environment
integrates naturally with the existing scene elements
harmonizes with the overall color palette and mood
appears physically plausible in the context
matches the photographic quality of the original
follows the same artistic style as the source
respects the lighting direction and intensity
lighting_consistency: lighting that matches the existing scene illumination
highlights and shadows consistent with the main light source
color temperature aligned with the ambient environment
appropriate rim lighting matching any backlight present
soft diffused lighting matching the overcast conditions
harsh directional shadows matching the direct sunlight
warm golden tones consistent with the golden hour
cool blue ambient light matching the twilight
dramatic contrast matching the studio setup
natural window light falling from the correct direction
shadow_detail: shadows fall in the correct direction matching the light source
shadow softness matches the diffusion level of existing shadows
contact shadows naturally ground the element
cast shadows have appropriate density and color
ambient occlusion appears realistic at contact points
shadow edges match the hardness of other shadows in scene
material_consistency: surface texture matches the implied material properties
reflectivity is consistent with the surface finish
fabric shows natural folds and creases
metallic surfaces display proper specular highlights
leather displays appropriate wear and patina
wood grain follows natural growth patterns
stone texture has realistic roughness and variation
glass surfaces show proper environmental reflections
preservation_clause: Keep everything else in the image exactly the same
Preserve the original style, lighting, and composition
Keep the main subject's position, scale, and pose unchanged
Ensure all other elements remain completely untouched
Maintain the exact framing and spatial relationships
Keep the person's face, expression, and features unchanged
Preserve all architectural and environmental details
Keep the background elements intact and unmodified
Maintain the original mood and overall atmosphere
Ensure the foreground elements stay exactly in place
Keep all existing textures and materials unchanged
Preserve the color grading and tonal range of the image
Keep all secondary subjects exactly as they appear
Maintain the original depth layering and spatial arrangement
style_element: the overall artistic style of the piece
the photographic quality and natural grain
the illustration linework and coloring style
